type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.result.ArtifactResolutionResult
type.description:
The result of executing an artifact resolution query.
@since 2.0

method.name: getComponents
method.description:
Return a set of ComponentResults representing all requested components.

Each element in the returned set is declared as an opaque org.gradle.api.artifacts.result.ComponentResult. However each element in the result will also implement one of the following interfaces:

  • ComponentArtifactsResult for any component whose ID could be resolved in the set of repositories.
  • org.gradle.api.artifacts.result.UnresolvedComponentResult for any component whose ID could not be resolved from the set of repositories.


returns:the set of results for all requested components

method.name: getResolvedComponents
method.description:
Return a set of ComponentResults representing all successfully resolved components.

Calling this method is the same as calling #getComponents() and filtering the resulting set for elements of type ComponentArtifactsResult.

returns:the set of all successfully resolved components

property.name: components
property.description:
Return a set of ComponentResults representing all requested components.

Each element in the returned set is declared as an opaque org.gradle.api.artifacts.result.ComponentResult. However each element in the result will also implement one of the following interfaces:

  • ComponentArtifactsResult for any component whose ID could be resolved in the set of repositories.
  • org.gradle.api.artifacts.result.UnresolvedComponentResult for any component whose ID could not be resolved from the set of repositories.


returns:the set of results for all requested components

property.name: resolvedComponents
property.description:
Return a set of ComponentResults representing all successfully resolved components.

Calling this method is the same as calling #getComponents() and filtering the resulting set for elements of type ComponentArtifactsResult.

returns:the set of all successfully resolved components
